ComicInfo.Summary:
First there was Alien. Then there was Predator. Amalgama’s not quite as lethal as those two… but she’s a whole lot sexier! The latest Danger Doll universe breakout hit series continues here. Don’t miss out!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Rod Espinosa | 3 | | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Rod Espinosa | 4 | | E | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Zoe Stanley | 5 | | F | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Zoe Stanley | 6 |
Note: The digital edition (12/11/2019) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Part Three
